blog.title: worry about the past. the future can wait.
blog.description:
No need to know the nAme. 
Swoon and marvel at simple things.
LOST defined life. Live in the Enchanted Forest. Love what happens in Westeros. Wish you could hang out in Rosewood with some pretty little liars. Agonize over the events in Beacon Hills. And so on. Unconditional Cut & Run, Titanic and LOTR lover. 
Proud Princess Aurora, Sansa Stark and Alison Dilaurentis supporter.

summary: Wow Emilia Clarke. Seemed always to be the brightest person in the world with her infectious expressiveness and good nature....
body:
Wow Emilia Clarke. Seemed always to be the brightest person in the world with her infectious expressiveness and good nature. It’s hard to imagine what she actually went through and the fact she endured it and still managed to make it out and keep this facade to the whole world when she certainly was in so much pain and lived in constant fear. She definitely has my respect and she is a living representation of strength in a woman. She is a living proof that a woman does not need any sword or any dragon to be strong. Hers is the emotional strength. I’m a man and while it’s cool to see a badass dragon queen THAT is the strength I value and I admire most.

Cheers Emilia. May you experience life to the fullest.

Cheers Emilia. May you experience life to the fullest.

tags: im just tired and i just want for dany and arya and sansa to all be friends and i want for sansa and arya to love their new sister pls
summary: I just know my dash is gonna be filled with Sansa hate come the first episode if the leaks are true like??? obviously she...
body: I just know my dash is gonna be filled with Sansa hate come the first episode if the leaks are true like??? obviously she doesn’t trust Dany, odds are Dany might not trust Sansa at first either. They’ve both seen a lot of shit and after what they’ve endured I don’t think either of them feel too trusting. I mean, Dany didn’t immediately trust Jon when they first met and now look. Dany just spent the last month on their journey to Winterfell having tons of sex w the man she loves. like…everything should work out in the end. they both deserve happy endings and I’m terrified that one or both of them are going to die.

summary: Stupid Jonsa argument. If Jon loves Dany why he didn’t say to Sansa “I bend the knee because  I love Dany “... because he...
body: Stupid Jonsa argument. If Jon loves Dany why he didn’t say to Sansa “I bend the knee because I love Dany “… because he didn’t. He didn’t bent the knee because of love. He bent the knee because he trusted her. Love wasn’t reason while he bent the knee. Reason was Dany and her personality

summary: Hey, why the spoilers be treating jumping on a dragon like jumping on a horse? Like it’s been well established that not even all...
body: Hey, why the spoilers be treating jumping on a dragon like jumping on a horse? Like it’s been well established that not even all Targaryens can do it and that they need to bond with their rider. And Jon hasn’t even really bonded with Rhaegal at all. Not to mention why would Dany, who thinks only Targaryens can ride and doesn’t know Jon is a Targaryen, risk Jon’s life like that? If Jon’s going to ride a dragon, it should be later on in the show at some sort of climactic moment. Not just right in the first episode just for kicks??? That’s honestly the dumbest, most fanficky thing in the leaks.

Not to mention why would Dany, who thinks only Targaryens can ride and doesn’t know Jon is a Targaryen, risk Jon’s life like that? If Jon’s going to ride a dragon, it should be later on in the show at some sort of climactic moment. Not just right in the first episode just for kicks??? That’s honestly the dumbest, most fanficky thing in the leaks.

Like it’s been well established that not even all Targaryens can do it and that they need to bond with their rider. And Jon hasn’t even really bonded with Rhaegal at all. Not to mention why would Dany, who thinks only Targaryens can ride and doesn’t know Jon is a Targaryen, risk Jon’s life like that? If Jon’s going to ride a dragon, it should be later on in the show at some sort of climactic moment. Not just right in the first episode just for kicks??? That’s honestly the dumbest, most fanficky thing in the leaks.

Not to mention why would Dany, who thinks only Targaryens can ride and doesn’t know Jon is a Targaryen, risk Jon’s life like that? If Jon’s going to ride a dragon, it should be later on in the show at some sort of climactic moment. Not just right in the first episode just for kicks??? That’s honestly the dumbest, most fanficky thing in the leaks.

summary: Poor Jon he doesn’t know what answers his annoying and mad sister when she asked “you bend the knee for North or Love?” What he...
body:
Poor Jon he doesn’t know what answers his annoying and mad sister when she asked “you bend the knee for North or Love?” What he can Say? If he answer that he loves Dany Sansa blames him “you betrayed North. You are traitor.”… he already knows this annoying girl. Kit already mentioned it in his interview. But if he answers that he bend the knee because of North … it sounds like “he doesn’t love Dany”… this imbecile girl makes everything worst… always.

How much I want this imbecile woman’s death. She is always problem. Nothing more

tags: i can't believe dany has gone through and achieved so much only to be diminished to a mediocre guy's girlfriend
summary: Frankly, I'll take Daenerys announcing each and every one of the titles she acquired with blood, pain and sacrifice over Jon...
body:
Frankly, I’ll take Daenerys announcing each and every one of the titles she acquired with blood, pain and sacrifice over Jon Snow constantly whimpering about how ‘I never wanted to lead! I didn’t ask for this!’ while failing miserably to get anything done.

Any. Fucking. Day.
